summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the 2008 Parks and Green Spaces Levy; accepting the recommendations of the 2008 Parks and Green Spaces Levy Oversight Committee concerning the Opportunity Fund and the Playfields subcategory; amending the 2011 Adopted Budget and 2011-2016 Capital Improvement Program; increasing appropriations in connection thereto; and ratifying and confirming certain prior acts, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
